paper_abstract: Since Laderman showed an algorithm for 3 x 3 matrix multiplication using 23 scalar multiplications, Johnson and McLoughlin used a numerical optimization and human controlled method to give two parameterized algorithms in which the coefficients are rational numbers. The algorithms are inequivalent to Laderman's one with respect to the transformation introduced by de Groote. We present a simple and fast numerical heuristic for finding valid algorithms. Then we show that many of the obtained algorithms are inequivalent to the published ones. (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the inequivalence of bilinear algorithms for 3 x 3 matrix multiplication
